title: IIT Dharwad Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Assistant Post
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad (IIT Dharwad) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Dharwad Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible ca...
